name: Chaotic Caverns
description:
Bear Jams Fall 2021 Submission Theme|Inconsistent Story

A Chaos Crystal. A gem with  extraordinary feats, being able to provide you with special powers. Except, until they are brought to the surface, the crystal is highly unstable. This makes it so that while beneath the ground, its power fluctuates at random. Getting to the crystal was the easy part, but now that the traps have been activated, things got a little more difficult. Use the power of the crystal to reach the surface and claim its power!

For the those who want a challenge: Collect the extra Chaos Crystals ( 2 Per Level ) which decrease the overall time intervals between power changes!

Controls

WASD or Arrows to move

R to Restart Level

Notes

- Almost didn't join cause I was lazy but I'm so glad I did! I feel like my skills completely improved over this short span so that was amazing. This was one of my more aesthetically pleasing games, which is pretty cool.

- I like lights now.

- Definitely got a little rushed at the end, so Levels 2 and 3 are a little poorly designed.

- Because of rush, there's bound to be errors and bugs; sorry.
